# cclapi

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of cclapi is to make downloading results from Community Connect Labs API easier ...

## Installation

You can install the released version of cclapi with:
```r
devtools::install_github("kianwazzu/cclapi")
```
